info.title: What is Session Configuration?
info.description: Session configuration allows you to specify which knowledge bases to use for different platforms or sessions, enabling personalized knowledge enhancement.
info.platformLevel: Platform Level: Applies to the entire platform (e.g., all QQ sessions)
info.sessionLevel: Session Level: Applies to specific sessions (e.g., specific QQ group)

dialog.platformIdHint: Platform identifier, such as qq, telegram, etc.
dialog.platformTooltip: Applies to all sessions on the platform
dialog.sessionTooltip: Applies only to the specified session
dialog.kbPlaceholder: Select one or more knowledge bases
dialog.kbHint: You can select multiple knowledge bases; they will be searched together during retrieval
dialog.topKHint: Number of results to return during retrieval

empty.noConfigs: No configurations yet. Click the add button to create your first configuration

delete.title: Confirm Delete
delete.confirmText: Are you sure you want to delete this configuration?
delete.warning: After deletion, the platform or session will no longer use the specified knowledge bases.

messages.scopeIdRequired: Please enter platform ID or session ID
messages.kbIdsRequired: Please select at least one knowledge base
